title: EthPeer.toString() method contains duplicated info
body:
the full enode ID is in there 3 times - think this could be reduced to enhance readability

eg this string "10da28908de0fa66b3c01834576689a9d5f15c107c3f981c955391c81b9bbf04d489322b822d18aeb45ca629a99a3564c9987419c817d793790463388fd73064" appears below 3 times

extract from besu log:
`PeerId 0x10da28908de0fa66b3c01834576689a9d5f15c107c3f981c955391c81b9bbf04d489322b822d18aeb45ca629a99a3564c9987419c817d793790463388fd73064, reputation PeerReputation 101, validated? true, disconnected? false, client: Geth/v1.12.0-stable-e501b3b0/darwin-amd64/go1.20.3, connection [Connection with hashCode 1391819581 with peer 0x10da28908de0fa66b3c01834576689a9d5f15c107c3f981c955391c81b9bbf04d489322b822d18aeb45ca629a99a3564c9987419c817d793790463388fd73064 inboundInitiated false initAt 1700020096121], enode enode://10da28908de0fa66b3c01834576689a9d5f15c107c3f981c955391c81b9bbf04d489322b822d18aeb45ca629a99a3564c9987419c817d793790463388fd73064@127.0.0.1:30303`
